name: Are You Smarter Than A Weenie Dog?
name_original: Are You Smarter Than A Weenie Dog?
description:
TAKE A CHANCE AT OUTSMARTING A WEENIE DOG (YES, THEY ARE VERY SMART) IN THIS DACHSHUND LOVERS AWARD WINNING TRIVIA GAME!

Are You Smarter Than A Weenie Dog is an International hit game that challenges You, the Weenie Dog Professor and your game center playing friends to determine who has the most trivia knowledge. Each of the seven categories (animals, arts & literature, entertainment, geography, history, sports and general), will challenge you to your trivia expertise in these categories. The Weenie Dog Professor posses the question, then you have 10 seconds to choose from one of four options.
Stuck on a particular question? After getting five answers correct, you will be awarded a hint to use when you get stumped.

Added Game Challenge:
The Weenie Dog Professor will also tally points for your progress you will then be able to measure against your friends trivia knowledge in the game center.

The Ultimate Challenge
You will have to achieve 85% or higher to move to the next category and outsmart the Weenie Dog Professor. Once all categories have been achieved at 85% or higher in the beginner level, you will be able to move to the Intermediate player level. You must then repeat the each category with a set of Intermediate level questions at 85% or higher to move to the next category and levels. This process is the same as you move up to each progressive level of the game as the challenge becomes greater.

This game is truly one of a kind. It is a sister to the IOS arcade game Wienieworld. It's all about the Weenie Dog in this world we create apps in. With over 10,000 trivia questions, Are You Smarter Than A Weenie Dog never gets old!

So what are you waiting for? Download Are You Smarter Than A Weenie Dog now and start challenging the Weenie Dog Professor and your friends!

Highlights:
Achieve category trivia fact knowledge- Be Smarter!
Beat the Weenie Dog Professor's challenge -outsmart that little smarty pants!
Combine wit and strategy
Challenge friends to a duel
Suggest and rate questions
Donate to a homeless Dachshund shelter
Rescue a Dachshund and take special loving care of it
Visit us on Facebook and Google+ and share your ideas, love for Dachshunds and our games with our community.

https://www.facebook.com/areyousmarterthanaweeniedog (AYSTAWD)
Google+ https://plus.google.com/+Wienieworld

Ruff, Ruff!!!!
